perturbation.original_text: The term of this Agreement (the “Term”) shall commence as of April 1, 2018 (the “Effective Date”) and shall expire upon the later of: (a) the conclusion of the 2022/23 NFL season and (b) the last day in February, 2023 (such expiration date, the “Scheduled Expiration Date”), unless sooner terminated pursuant to the terms of this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: The term of this Agreement (the “Term”) shall commence as of April 1, 2018 (the “Effective Date”) and shall expire upon the later of: (a) the conclusion of the 2022/23 NFL season and (b) the last day in February, 2023 (such expiration date, the “Scheduled Expiration Date”), and may be extended by mutual agreement for subsequent periods.
perturbation.explanation: The original text sets a definitive expiration date. By adding "and may be extended by mutual agreement for subsequent periods," we introduce uncertainty. It is no longer clear if the agreement automatically expires on the Scheduled Expiration Date, or if it can be extended indefinitely. This contradicts the original intention of a fixed term and requires an agreement for expiration.

perturbation.changed_text: In consideration for the Benefits, during each Contract Year of the Term, Sponsor shall pay Club, the Annual Fee. The Annual Fee shall be determined on a yearly basis by the Club, taking into consideration market rates and the team's performance.
perturbation.explanation: The original text clearly specifies the Annual Fee for each contract year. The modified version removes these specific amounts and states the Annual Fee will be determined yearly by the Club. This directly contradicts the original fixed fee schedule and introduces uncertainty as to how much the Sponsor will actually pay each year.

perturbation.original_text:
Sponsor shall pay Club the Annual Fee for each Contract Year of this Agreement in six (6) equal installments, each
due on or prior to the 1st of each month between June and November of the applicable Contract Year.
perturbation.changed_text: Sponsor shall pay Club the Annual Fee based on a payment schedule to be determined by the Club, which may include monthly, quarterly, or lump-sum payments at the Club's discretion.
perturbation.explanation: The original text sets a clear schedule of six equal installments due monthly between June and November. The modified version gives the Club full discretion to set the payment schedule, contradicting the original defined schedule and creating uncertainty for the Sponsor.
